column4: Tesla reaches agreement with Shanghai to explore production: Bloomberg

column4: Tesla reaches agreement with Shanghai to explore production-Bbg
column5: June 22 U.S. electric-car maker Tesla Inc has reached a preliminary agreement with Shanghai to explore production in the Chinese city  Bloomberg reported on Thursday  citing people familiar with the matter. (https://bloom.bg/2twAd6z)
